runs.comm: confident start for Hales. Eases into a sweetly-timed drive to mid-off

no debut dream for Hales then! Out for a duck second ball! This looked dead straight away and the umpire's finger was up in a no time. Wicket-to-wicket line and Hales played outside of it. Thudded into the pad and it's all over
Pietersen starts by waltzing across his stumps to try and whip to leg. Misses the ball though
Pietersen shuffled down and outside off to work to leg again. Flicked the pad and went to slip where Dravid flung back a throw
the familiar sight of Dhoni stuffing up a take. Clipped the pad and ran away
Pietersen has to stay put and Praveen's lines are good again. Worked to the on side
starts well outside off and Pietersen runs across his stumps to flip to leg
no midwicket in place so Pietersen works a straightish ball away for a couple
bowler misfields to allow Pietersen a single for his punch-drive. All of which means Kieswetter finally gets to face a ball
very solid defence of his off stump. Good line from Vinay, though
Kieswetter is away by chopping down to third man
big appeal as Pietersen is struck in front of the stumps on the pads. But he'd charged half-way down. And outside the line, to be fair. Still, Pietersen hasn't really got going yet
oh dear. Inside edge gets Pietersen four but he knew nothing about it. The batsman shuffled outside leg, got back in line, swung wildly and it sped away. Praveen's line didn't vary. Have to love him
inside edge again, it bobbles away this time. Meanwhile, there is a pinkish sunset that makes Manchester look like Jaipur. Absurdly
Kieswetter nudges into space
Pietersen pushes to cover after running around the crease. Odd, he looks frenetic, which is needless for one who hits so cleanly
quietly pushed to mid-off for a single. This is Pietersen's last England innings in a long time remember, he's been 'rested' from the ODIs
good start from India. Kumar has been excellent

dropped! Good effort by Parthiv in the outfield I suppose. Pietersen flayed wildly and it looped out towards Parhiv. He hared in, well, he tried to, managed to get his hands under it but spilled it diving forward. Worse still it bobbled away for four
again Pietersen looks uncomfortable but works a single
wild swish off a medium pacer but still it goes off the edge miles back into the stands for six. Big bats these days
pushed away for a single
not a good ball here. Shortish and Pietersen stands still this time and whacks a four to  deep square
Pietersen aims a drive, mistimes it and gets a single
pushed to the off side for a quick single
Kieswetter aims big and gets little. Nothing in fact. Walked outside leg to try and launch over cover but ended up with nothing but inside edge
ah much better from Kieswetter. Calmer. Gave himself just a little bit of room and punched a drive through the off-side ring
play and a miss as Kieswetter flays at fresh air

Kieswetter ran very far outside leg stump and ended up having to really reach for this outside off. Still he timed it very firmly through the off side and Rohit dives over the ball on the boundary. Not the best piece of fielding
after boundaries from (semi) controlled shots, Kieswetter reverts to hacking and mistimes it
starts a touch leg side and Pietersen sweeps hard over to the fine leg boundary
good bowling, saw Pietersen edging down and fired it in quick
cat and mouse as Ashwin pre-empts a Pietersen charge by shoving down the leg side. Trouble is Pietersen stood still so it was a wide
Pietersen shuffles down leg and back into line before sweeping a single
fired well down the leg side
Kieswetter hops down and flicks to deep midwicket
Pietersen dabs a very Dravid-like single with an open face down
slipped down leg again. Eep
oh dear, that ends an expensive over. Again a touch leg side and Pietersen nailed his sweep shot away for four
gone now! India break the spell of runs. Slightly slower ball duped Kieswetter who punched his drive straight to cover
Morgan starts by skipping down the wicket and blocking firmly back to the bowler
Morgan was done there! Slower ball and Morgan was through the shot a touch early ended up guiding it in the air, one-bounce to deep cover
not sure Pietersen knew much of this. Aimed a sweep but top-edged it into his face.  Lucky he had a visor, really
beaten! Top delivery. Pitches a zips away past the outside edge
blocked back to the bowler who picks up, casually throws to a fielder and collects his cap. Good work from Munaf, must be thrilled to get off the bench

how about that for a start! Dhoni, for the first time all summer, is excellent behind the stumps! Shoved down the leg side, Pietersen came too far out his ground and Dhoni had the bails off in a flash
in-drift finds an inside edge that runs to fine leg to get Bopara away
beats Morgan this time. Outside off stump with his medium-pace wobble
worked off pad towards midwicket
touch of nibble away from the bat. Bopara defends nervously
beaten! Once again Bopara looks like he's tetchy. Full outside off and he plays over it
worked carefully into the leg side
Bopara skips down without quite reaching the ball, ends up working it off a pad away to fine leg
that eases the pressure slightly. Morgan with that extra-cover drive of his drills this through a fine gap, hard enough to beat the outfielder
short ball punished! Hops back and thrashes it in front of the deep point
Morgan gets enough of this. Shoves his foot down and and flays through the line, swinging it rows back into the stands over cow corner
Rohit is lucky here, short ball again but Morgan's pull found the leg-side sweeper
Bopara carefully works this with his wrists to deep square. Wanted two but only one available
width outside Bopara's off stump and he flashes it to third man to bring Morgan back on strike
hint of inside edge finds pad and bobbles away. Kohli doing an excellent job here
Bopara shuffles to leg to try and open up the off but ends up skewing a drive to midwicket. Good running turns one into two
carefully watched the slower ball. Didn't see it at first and had to pull out an attacking shot and push to midwicket
driven crisply down the ground
excellent from Morgan. Such clear thinking and confidence to carry off his plan. Gets down early and flips this over his shoulder, past the wicketkeeper and short fine leg away for four
Bopara content to work a single and get Morgan on strike. Sweeping cagily from outside off stump
dragged short and Morgan, as is his way, really tries to smash his pull shot. Didn't quite time it though
Bopara did well to get a bat on this in the end. Ran down and bowler fired it leg side, Bopara adjusted to get a tickle to short fine leg
defended neatly to the leg side to get Morgan a single
crisply clipped  off the legs, but straight to midwicket
yorker to end the over. Bopara digs it out
Morgan's open-faced cover drive finds enough of a gap to get a couple
that'll do nicely for Morgan. Outside edge speeds past Dhoni and away for four
Morgan is up to 30, only needed 17 balls, driven hard to deep point
Bopara edges down the wicket and drives firmly to long-on
yeesh. That pitched and rolled. Absolute grubber. Shot and Morgan was back to cut but it scuttled under his bat and just past the off stump
heaved without a  lot of timing to straightish midwicket
lucky for Bopara. Rushes down and tries to smash it down the ground. Didn't really get it and it looped high, higher and plopped down into space between twi fielders
Bopara picks out the infield
nerves showing for Bopara here. Aims a reverse sweep that is top-edged into his helmet
short ball is bottom edged to deep cover
down the wicket again and punched out to long-on
bit of a struggle this for Bopara. Down the wicket and is almost yorked. Inside edge ends up finding fine leg
after all that Praveen starts with a full-toss down leg that Morgan gleefully whips away for four to fine leg
Morgan looks in fine fettle. Times his cut shot perfectly out to deep cover
that was neat enough, driven off the back foot to deep point
Morgan skips down the wicket but only to defend with an inside edge. Goes into pad and away to the off side
he can't connect again. Comes down the wicket but Praveen finds the pads and it bobbles away for a single
Wonderful from Morgan. Low full toss but he some how has enough power to shove this over mid-off and away for four
finally Bopara finds the middle. Hurries down the wicket and finds a gap wide of long-on by driving sweetly. His first boundary
single follows the boundary. Worked wristily to leg
reverse-sweep! So wristy and daring. Gets this from outside leg stump through third man
touch short from Ashwin and Morgan hops back to bang it away through cover
straighter ball from Ashwin is worked to leg
Bopara really went hard at this short one, but picked out cover with his cut shot

well well, what have we here! India are celebrating but Morgan is having none of it. Morgan flashed hard towards point where Rohit dived forward to take what looked like a good catch. Very low but it looks like the fingers are under it. Morgan asked for the umpires to take a look and they have gone upstairs. We know the TV replay is uncertain with these but it looks like a clean catch... OUT. The third umpire had a long look but gave it. Right decision you'd think and a very big wicket, too
starts by pushing a drive to mid-off
nervy from Patel, inside edge dribbles leg side and Bopara calls him through
pressure on Bopara to find his range now. Drives this firmly towards long-off, might have been two if Morgan was at the other end. As it is, just a single
Patel drops and runs to cover. That'll do for now for England
excellent over from Munaf. Bopara pushes to cover and Samit had come a long way down, had the throw at the bowler's end been allowed to hit the stumps Samit may well have been out
Praveen finds an outside edge that runs away to third man. Lots of batting to come, when do England gamble
shortish ball is whipped to deep square. Again just a single
Samit looked like he wanted to go big here, edging down the track and outside leg. But Praveen's length and line was solid and it was just pushed to deep point

four! Bopara gets the boundary but his heart would have been in his mouth for a moment. Full-toss crunched  very hard down to cow corner where Munaf ran in, slid past the ball and it went away for four
low full toss this time is flipped to deep square
good yorker to end the over and Praveen's spell. Samit digs out a single to midwicket
not the most perfect piece of timing from Samit. Thuds a low full toss to long-off
Bopara tried to give himself room outside leg to smash through off bit couldn't time the shot. Valuable dot ball and the pressure heaps back onto Bopara
Bopara called two when he hit it but his leg-side clip went straight to deep midwicket
again a top-edged slugs plugs into space. Samit tried to heave it leg side but could't get it ideally
Samit down the pitch to smash wide of long-off, who slips momentarily and allows Bopara to return to the non-striker's end for a sharp two
Samit down the wicket to drive down the ground for a single
good start from Munaf! Touch slower and Samit ran down and swung past the ball

haha! Samit has snapped his bat here. Odd. The handle has snapped at its base. Bottom edge as he tried to slug it out to the off side and the bat just flew away. Samit was left holding a handle with no bat at the  end of it!
excellent bowling from Munaf again. Perfect yorker that is just about jabbed out
good timing from Samit but still just a single. Samit backed away, Munaf went full and outside off and it was driven hard to deep cover
dot ball! Excellent from Munaf. Slower ball that Bopara heaved at and missed
brilliant from Munaf! That over has got India right back in it. Yorker slips past Bopara as he aims a drive. India must be favourites now!
wide given. Ooh, that's a harsh call. Samit backed away so Vinay went full and well outside off. It was within the wide-guideline marks though
boundary! Sweet relief but pure luck for England. Samit backed away, bottom edged and it sped past a diving Dhoni away. Five from five!
that will be it! Samit backs away and gets more of this. Squeezed off the top-toe-edge and flew wide of Dhoni and away for four to third man!
finally Samit times one perfectly and finishes it in style! Down the track and smashes it over cover away for four. Punched the air a good four times, clearly meant plenty to him
